item.title: Applying Linked List to Embedded systems
item.description: This is the code // C program to implement // the above approach #include<stdio.h>#include<stdlib.h> void setup() { pinMode(LED_BUILTIN,OUTPUT); Serial.begin(115200); } /* structure for a node */ struct Node { int data; struct Node *next; }; /* Function to insert a node at the beginning of a Circular linked list */ void push(struct Node **head_ref, int data) { struct Node *ptr1 = (struct Node *)malloc(sizeof(struct Node)); struct Node *temp = *head_ref; ptr1->data = data; ptr1->next = *head_ref; /* If linked list is not NULL then set the next of last node */ if (*head_ref !
